text: Los Rios Community College District is a public community college district headquartered in Sacramento, California. It has four colleges and several education centers serving approximately 70,000 students. The chancellor is Brian King. ==Colleges== *American River College (opened 1955) *Consumnes River College (opened 1970) *Folsom Lake College (opened 2004) *Sacramento City College (opened 1916) ==References== Category:1965 establishments in California Category:California Community Colleges
title: Los Rios Community College District
